turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I'd like a grande caffè mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where did you want to make that order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. let me repeat that back for you to make sure i got it right. you want a grande cafe mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks in bluffton ohio. it should be ready for pick up in about 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with today?
